nodes.text: The blue-tailed flangth-hound was a creature. One disgraced former House Guardsman held the opinion that a lord did not know the difference between the creature and flarg, meaning it was the Guard's responsibility to save the nobles from themselves.

The blue-tailed flangth-hound was mentioned in the character template for the Disgraced House Guardsman in Player's Guide to Tapani. The relationship between the creature and the popular food flangth was not elaborated on.
